keys.value:
It took a lot of hard work to get here.
Thanks to you stabilizing the magic power by defeating the Dragon Gods, the transport ship to go to Magmapora is ready.
Then leave quickly for Magmapora. Let's do it.

It is said that there are very few people who have recently visited Magmapora.
It is because the Magmaphora transport ship has stopped operating due to the demon army's interference.
It seems that rumors about you newcomer have been inflated beyond imagination. Hey.
Hakanasu's hero... Well, that's not wrong.
...Sorry for always leaving you with difficult tasks.

The crocoons of Magmapora are very stubborn.
And they take great pride in their work.
In a way, you can see that each and every one of them is no different from a craftsman.
Magma There is hot lava flowing in Pora that is incomparable to other regions. We Crocoons are under the protection of Nerhes, the god of fire, so there is no place like this.
West Guard Left
Lee Sang Moo! As long as I'm here, today's magmapo is peaceful.
East Guard Light

Hello. To go to the Red Forest, you must have a Fellow of Magmaphora.
It will be difficult for non-crocoon races without protection.
Are you talking about the Left? This is my younger brother. I don't know if he's doing well because he's missing a screw.
...Kkeuh... Alcohol is calling me.

Huh... I'm glad I'm an inn employee. At least you don't have to worry about getting into an accident somewhere you don't know.
Before the mine closed, he was a very good father.
Well... If I lose my job overnight, I think it would be painful.
Information Merchant Livio

… what. I'm on the small side compared to other crocoons.
But it's good to hide among people and listen to information.
Everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses.
This new uniform is too hot...
Comfortable presenti

I do household chores such as laundry, cleaning, and washing dishes from door to door.
Magma is often heated, and most of the cases do not pay much attention to housework because everyone is busy with their own work. .
It's a fun and rewarding job, but the work doesn't stop because everyone wants to do it.
Ridere the chatterbox

No, listen. The Left and Wright brothers, who have been troublesome since they were naughty. After my parents died, the supervisor called me and made me work as a security guard. Do you remember how everyone never thought that the two of them would do it right?
But they say they work really hard! not peculiar huh? yes yes that's right. My parents got into an accident on the Turimran side of the Red Hammer. It's a pity.
Candy Artisan Vita
...cough. It's a bit cold today...
Stockman Levero
Let's see... I have plenty of beer and wine... The tableware has been worn out lately.
Lavini Wonbini<Upper Crescent Moon>

I was also good at one time. There was once a business in Hakanasu!
But...the wrong line. Eh...
Well, this is the story. Don't worry...
Lavini Tubini<Upper Crescent Moon>

I will not give up. Until I take revenge on the guild that sent me here.
So please help me too!
Auction House Broker

This auction house is a secret but legitimate place.
It's amazing to see astronomical amounts of money going back and forth for things that seem worthless even though I've been doing this for a long time.
Stubborn old man

When I was young, I was certified as an artisan by King Hakanasu now!
Do you know how common magic craftsmen are?
Now that I'm older, I came here to make a successor, but this bastard Why do crocoons not listen to me like this?
Artisan Jedamas

Something will work in the past. I lived without thinking.
I almost lost something precious then.
Artisan Minos

Do you know who the quick-handed Crocoon is? That's me, Minos!
I'm talking like my father, saying that inspiration lacks delicacy.
I can't make the best things, but I make them quickly and sell them cheaply, so there's demand for them.
Small differences They say they make luxury goods, but there has to be someone who makes cheap and decent things like this.
Artisan Local

You don't know what a great temper our cutie Rubrom is.
He melted down a whole weapon he made yesterday hahaha!
Yes. Come to think of it, it was a work that I couldn't make enough for my inspiration to nag me!
Our Rubrom has a good eye.

Magmapora is such a wonderful place!
I can't tell you how grateful I am to have been born here.
How can everyone be so uninterested?
Knowing the history of the previous era is great How important!
Old Wraith
Innkeeper Luke

Welcome. Welcome to the inn for quenching the history of Magmapora!
...It's been a while since I almost forgot to say hello.
